trans-unit.source: Exposes <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox" /> types to UI Automation.
trans-unit.target: Предоставляет типы <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox" /> для модели автоматизации пользовательского интерфейса.

trans-unit.source: The element associated with this automation peer.
trans-unit.target: Элемент, связанный с данным одноранговым элементом автоматизации.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Инициализирует новый экземпляр класса <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of child elements of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Получает коллекцию дочерних элементов объекта <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox" />, связанного с данным объектом <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren" />.
trans-unit.target: Данный метод вызывается методом <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren" />.

trans-unit.source: The child elements of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Дочерние элементы объекта <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox" />, связанного с данным объектом <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: A value enumeration that specifies the control pattern.
trans-unit.target: Перечисление значений, указывающее шаблон элемента управления.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control pattern for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox" /> that is associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Возвращает шаблон элемента управления для <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox" />, связанного с этим <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: An object that supports the control pattern if <paramref name="patternInterface" /> is the <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ExpandCollapse" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ItemContainer" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Scroll" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.SynchronizedInput" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Transform" />, or <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Value" /> value, this method returns an object that supports the control pattern; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Объект, поддерживающий шаблон элемента управления, если <paramref name="patternInterface" /> является значением <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ExpandCollapse" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ItemContainer" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Scroll" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.SynchronizedInput" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Transform" /> или <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Value" />; в противном случае — значение <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer" /> is read-only
trans-unit.target: Получает значение, указывающее, является ли элемент <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox" />, связанный с объектом <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer" />, доступным только для чтения.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer" /> is not enabled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: Значение <see langword="true" />, если объект <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox" />, связанный с данным объектом <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer" />, не включен; в противном случае — значение <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Sets the keyboard focus on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Устанавливает фокус клавиатуры на объекте <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox" />, связанном с данным объектом <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.SetFocus" />.
trans-unit.target: Данный метод вызывается методом <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.SetFocus" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer" /> did not get focus.
trans-unit.target: Объект <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox" />, связанный с данным объектом <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer" />, не получил фокуса.

trans-unit.source: The value to set the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox.Text" /> property to.
trans-unit.target: Значение, задаваемое для свойства <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox.Text" />.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox.Text" /> property of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer" /> to the specified value.
trans-unit.target: Задает для свойства <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox.Text" /><see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox" />, связанного с данным <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer" />, заданное значение.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer" /> is not enabled.
trans-unit.target: Объект <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox" />, связанный с данным объектом <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer" />, не включен.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Свойство <paramref name="value" /> имеет значение <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox.Text" /> property of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer" />
trans-unit.target: Получает свойство <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox.Text" /> класса <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox" />, связанного с <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer" />

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox.Text" /> property of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer" />
trans-unit.target: Свойство <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox.Text" /> класса <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox" />, связанного с <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer" />
